entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
